Description: Mould-made pottery lamp with an angled nozzle, decorated on the discus with a grasshopper feeding. The shoulder is decorated with ovules. The lamp stands on a raised base. Greenish-blue clay, covered with a purple-brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q1953)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs W N Weech
